page.title: 18Our Family Weekend Saturday
page.content:
We get up early on{Saturday}and go {shopping.}At about 11.30 we would return home. When we arrive home we unpack the shopping, have a drink and then we go to my{brother's school}to pick him up. When we get home we have a quick snack for{lunch.
Then my brother and I go to our rooms and we do our{homework.}When we have finished we put on some old clothes and go and help{Mummy}in the{garden. At 4.30 I go into the house to make a drink for everyone. My brother and I watch{television.
At 6.00 Mummy starts to make{supper. When we have finished we watch television until it is time to go to bed.
